name: LOTRIČ Metrology Ltd.
goal:
Is to influence and inform itself about policies in sectors of: transport, health industry. We have been calibrating and testing with a love for metrology for nearly three decades. We develop state of the art, highly perfected, but easy to use metrology products and services. We transfer knowledge, represent top Slovene and foreign producers of measurement, pharmaceutical and laboratory equipment, and are at the same time a driving force for progress of the field of metrology.

As an entrepreneur, the current owner and general manager Marko Lotrič started with the workshop, where he worked mainly in the field of calibration of scales, weights and pipettes.

Today, group unites over 120 experts in the field of metrology, employees in sic countries and more than 30 outcourced staff members.

In addition to the parent company LOTRIČ Metrology, which operates since its beginings in Selška valley, there are two companies in Slovenia which operate in Kranj - LOTRIČ Certificiranje and in Podnart - Iskra LOTRIČ. Subsidiaries are operating in Croatia, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Serbia, Macedonia and Austria, where they are established as accredited laboratories.
